name: A Bird Against The World
description:
"A Bird Against The World" by AshBurn66 was made for Mini Jam 99 - Birds.

---Controls---

W / Up - Move Up

S / Down - Move Down

Spacebar / Left Click - Attack (Only during boss fights)

I will probably keep working on this game after the game jam ends, since I couldn't add everything I wanted to in time, and it's kind of rough around the edges.

EDIT: I have added a WebGL version to play in the browser. It took a while to figure out how to do but I managed. Unfortunately some things don't work right, but they're mostly visual things. Functionally, the game works perfectly fine.
